description:
Shaman King is about a boy with a shaman power, http://anidb.net/ch11321 [Asakura You], who wanted to become a king of shaman.
Asakura You might look like a laid back junior high school kid. However, he is a shaman with a special ability to communicate with all the souls and spirits and possess them into his body! He came to Funbari, Tokyo to make friends with all of the powerful ghosts and to become the best Shaman ever.
